Title: Step 9: Debrief with Captain Adrian Falkner
Text: I need to talk to Captain Falkner for a final debriefing on my performance.

pages:
This formal letter, sealed with the emblem of Fort Harbenshire, contains the official results of your final test under Captain Adrian Falkner.
Sent by the fort's administration, it details your performance during the simulation with Guardian-RX and

evaluates your accuracy, speed, and strategic thinking.
The letter emphasizes how close your score came to the top contenders and provides insightful feedback on how you handled the simulated combat scenario.

While you managed to keep Guardian-RX safe, the letter notes a few moments of vulnerability that affected your score-though you still rank among the top hundred candidates to have ever passed through Fort Harbenshire's rigorous exam.
Signed at the bottom is Captain Falkner’s personal commendation, acknowledging your excellent performance under fire and your potential for future challenges.

Lore: §9You have successfully defended Guardian-RX at Fort Harbenshire
display.Name: §dFinal Test Results Letter

CompleteText: Captain Falkner debriefed me on my performance in the test. My final score will be mailed to me.
NextQuestTitle: Step 10: Collect the final score at any post office
